path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/VTRConnect Smart Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Validation of adding tokens in whitelist during deployment
findings.description: The constructor phase lacks token validation, potentially leading to duplicate token insertion with unintended consequences.

findings.title: Gas Golfing
findings.description: The validation check within the _mint function duplicates an already performed validation, increasing runtime gas consumption and making it redundant.

findings.title: One check is added twice. Can be removed.
findings.description: The validation within the _mint function duplicates a check, making it redundant and unnecessary, increasing runtime gas consumption.
